I would choose the day when i met my significant other. because it was such a special day that we both feel and it was amazing.
I would choose the day when i graduated from college. because it was my most proud day, and it means that i have done something important for myself.
I would choose the day when i went to the beach. because i enjoyed it so much, i have never felt in a place so relaxing and beautiful.
I would choose the day when i went to the movies with my friends. because it was amazing, i laugh and giggle a lot and i enjoy with my friends.
I would choose the day when i had my last supper with my family. because it was so special and emotional, and it was amazing to spend this time with my family.
